text: This is a list of magazines that are of interest to men. Topics included in these magazines are men's health, fashion and style, new technology and gadgets, sports, and magazines that features women on their cover such as pornographic magazines for men. There are also LGBT-related magazines for gay men. ==General male audience== ==Ethnic men's magazines== ===African/Afro- Caribbean American men's magazines=== *Black Enterprise *King (U.S.) *Smooth (U.S.) ===Latin American men's magazines=== *Hombre *Open Your Eyes *Donjuan (magazine) (Colombia) *Soho (magazine) (Colombia) ===Arab men's magazine=== * Arrajol ==Gay male magazines== ==Lads' mags== ==Pornographic magazines== ==Sports magazines== *Sportsnet *Sports Illustrated *Runner's World *Guns and Ammo *Outdoors *Hiker's World *Nature's World Category:Magazines Category:Lists
title: List of men's magazines
